job_title: Operations Manager in Steamboat Springs, CO

job_title: Community Health Worker in Grand Junction, CO

Most recently, I needed to have surgery and I was able to be paid my whole pay check while I was out for two months.  It was so nice to be able to receive my paycheck while recovering and to have  job to come back when I was able.  Mind Springs Health has shown me that they truly do care about their employees and their clients!
cons: Please keep in mind when applying that patience with the clients is necessary.
